description*.en: "Bragg Angle" describes the condition for a plane wave to be diffracted from a family of lattice planes, the angle between the wavevector of the incident plane wave, and the lattice planes.

title: BraggAngle
description: "Bragg Angle" describes the condition for a plane wave to be diffracted from a family of lattice planes, the angle between the wavevector of the incident plane wave, and the lattice planes.
